password.description: Password for the user accessing the API. Can be specified with the `BITBUCKET_PASSWORD` environment variable.

username.description: Local user name for the bitbucket API. Can be specified with the `BITBUCKET_USERNAME` environment variable.

id.description: The ID of the branch restriction.

pattern.description: Branch restrictions applied to branches of this pattern.

repository.description: This can either be the repository slug or the UUID of the repository.

value.description: Value with kind-specific semantics: `require_approvals_to_merge` uses it to require a minimum number of approvals on a PR; `require_default_reviewer_approvals_to_merge` uses it to require a minimum number of approvals from default reviewers on a PR; `require_passing_builds_to_merge` uses it to require a minimum number of passing builds.

workspace.description: This can either be the workspace ID (slug) or the workspace UUID.

block.description: `bitbucket_branch_restriction` manages a branch restriction rule for a repository.

id.description: The ID of the default reviewer.

repository.description: This can either be the repository slug or the UUID of the repository.

user.description: This can either be the username or the user UUID.

workspace.description: This can either be the workspace ID (slug) or the workspace UUID.

block.description: `bitbucket_default_reviewers` manages default reviewers for a repository.

group.description: This can either be the group or the group UUID.

id.description: The ID of the group permission.

repository.description: This can either be the repository slug or the UUID of the repository.

workspace.description: This can either be the workspace ID (slug) or the workspace UUID.

block.description: `bitbucket_group_permission` manages group permission for a repository.

id.description: The ID of the pipeline variable.

key.description: The unique name of the variable.

repository.description: This can either be the repository slug or the UUID of the repository.

secured.description: If true, this variable will be treated as secured. The value will never be exposed in the logs or the REST API.

value.description: The value of the variable. If the variable is secured, this will be empty.

workspace.description: This can either be the workspace ID (slug) or the workspace UUID.

block.description: bitbucket_pipeline_variable` manages a bitbucket pipeline variable.

workspace.description: The name of the workspace where the project is created.
The name of the workspace where the repository is created.

block.description: `bitbucket_repository` data source can be used to retrieve the UUID for a reposistory by name and workspace.
`bitbucket_workspace` data source can be used to retrieve the UUID for a workspace by name.
